title: e-Learning Practical Skills Enhancement: Diabetes Educator Competency Development Through Customized Collaborative Learning Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can design personalized educational strategies reflecting the cultural and individual characteristics of diabetic patients.
Learners can build feedback systems with peer teachers and share educational materials through collaborative learning.
Learners can develop and implement diabetes education modules linked to mathematics curricula through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
